org.dalesbred

Class TransactionSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dalesbred.TransactionSettings

  • public final class TransactionSettings
extends Object
    Contains all the settings that can be configured for individual-transactions.
    See Also:
    Database.withTransaction(TransactionSettings, TransactionCallback)

      • setRetries

        public void setRetries(int retries)
